text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Yamada was born in Hamamatsu on December 27, 1988. After graduating from Meiji University, he joined J1 League club Júbilo Iwata in 2011. He played as regular player from first season. However Júbilo was relegated to J2 League end of the 2013 season. In July 2014, he moved to German 2. Bundesliga club Karlsruher SC. He played for the club for three seasons. In summer 2017, he returned to Júbilo Iwata which playing in J1. However the club was relegated to J2 at the end of the 2019 season. In July 2013, Yamada was selected for the Japan national team for 2013 East Asian Cup. At this tournament, he debuted against Australia on July 25. He played two games for Japan in 2013. ==Club statistics== Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 2014 (NSK MOOK)", 14 February 2014, Japan, (p. 163 out of 290) Club Season League Cup League Cup Other1 Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Júbilo Iwata 2011 29 5 2 0 5 0 1 0 37 5 2012 31 9 2 0 6 3 — 39 12 2013 29 8 2 0 6 0 — 37 8 2014 17 3 0 0 0 0 — 17 3 2017 4 1 0 0 0 0 — 4 1 Total 110 26 6 0 17 3 1 0 134 29 Karlsruher SC 2014–15 33 6 2 0 — — 35 6 2015–16 31 3 1 0 — — 32 3 2016–17 24 1 0 0 — — 24 1 Total 88 10 3 0 0 0 0 0 91 10 Júbilo Iwata 2017 5 1 1 0 0 0 — 6 1 2018 32 2 2 1 3 0 — 37 3 2019 23 1 0 0 0 0 — 23 1 2020 40 3 0 0 0 0 — 40 3 2021 38 11 0 0 0 0 — 38 11 2022 7 0 0 0 0 0 — 7 0 2023 0 0 0 0 0 0 — 0 0 Total 145 18 3 1 3 0 0 0 148 19 Career Total 340 53 14 3 20 3 1 0 375 59 1Includes Suruga Bank Championship. ==National team statistics== Japan National Football Team Database Japan national team Japan national team Japan national team Year Apps Goals 2013 2 0 Total 2 0 ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Júbilo Iwata *Suruga Bank Championship (1) : 2011 *J2 League : 2021 ===Japan=== *EAFF East Asian Cup (1) : 2013 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Shizuoka Prefecture Category:Japan international footballers Category:J1 League players Category:J2 League players Category:Júbilo Iwata players
